total_revenue.context: Q3 2021 net sales increased to $110.8 billion, up 15% year-over-year. Excluding the $0.5 billion favorable impact from foreign exchange rates, net sales grew by 15% compared to Q3 2020.
total_revenue.fx_impact: Foreign exchange rates had a favorable impact of $0.5 billion on net sales growth.

net_sales.context: North America net sales increased to $65.557 billion, up 10% year-over-year.

operating_expenses.context: Operating expenses for North America increased to $64.677 billion, up 52% year-over-year.

operating_income.context: Operating income for North America decreased to $0.880 billion in Q3 2021, compared with $2.141 billion in Q3 2020.

net_sales.context: International net sales increased to $29.145 billion, up 16% year-over-year.

operating_expenses.context: Operating expenses for International increased to $30.056 billion, up 52% year-over-year.

operating_income.context: Operating income for International decreased to -$0.911 billion in Q3 2021, compared with $0.345 billion in Q3 2020.

net_sales.context: AWS net sales increased to $16.110 billion, up 39% year-over-year.

operating_expenses.context: Operating expenses for AWS increased to $11.227 billion, up 52% year-over-year.

operating_income.context: Operating income for AWS increased to $4.883 billion in Q3 2021, compared with $3.535 billion in Q3 2020.

net_sales.context: Consolidated net sales increased to $110.812 billion, up 15% year-over-year.

operating_expenses.context: Consolidated operating expenses increased to $105.960 billion, up 31% year-over-year.

operating_income.context: Consolidated operating income decreased to $4.852 billion in Q3 2021, compared with $6.194 billion in Q3 2020.

total_expenses.context: Consolidated operating expenses for Q3 2021 were $105.960 billion, up 31% from $89.951 billion in Q3 2020.
key_factors: Expanded marketing and general administrative expenses

COGS.context: Cost of goods sold decreased to $126 million in Q3 2021.

Fulfillment.context: Fulfillment expenses decreased to $473 million in Q3 2021.

Technology_and_content.context: Technology and content expenses decreased to $1.627 billion in Q3 2021.

Marketing.context: Marketing expenses decreased to $657 million in Q3 2021.

General_and_administrative.context: General and administrative expenses decreased to $297 million in Q3 2021.

Other.context: WW shipping costs increased to $18.108 billion in Q3 2021.

Stock_based_Compensation.context: Total stock-based compensation expense decreased to $3.180 billion in Q3 2021.

operating_income.context: Consolidated operating income decreased to $4.852 billion in Q3 2021, compared with $6.194 billion in Q3 2020.

net_income.context: Net income decreased to $3.2 billion in Q3 2021, compared with $6.3 billion in Q3 2020.

eps.context: Net income of $3.2 billion translates to $6.12 per diluted share in Q3 2021, compared with $12.37 per diluted share in Q3 2020.

free_cash_flow.context: Free cash flow decreased to $2.6 billion for the trailing twelve months, down from $29.5 billion the previous year.

operating_cash_flow.context: Operating cash flow decreased by 1% to $54.7 billion for the trailing twelve months.

free_cash_flow_less_principal_repayments.context: Free cash flow less principal repayments of finance leases and financing obligations decreased to an outflow of $8.8 billion for the trailing twelve months, compared with an inflow of $18.4 billion the previous year.

free_cash_flow_less_equipment_and_other_.context: Free cash flow less equipment finance leases and principal repayments of all other finance leases and financing obligations decreased to an outflow of $3.9 billion for the trailing twelve months, compared with an inflow of $17.9 billion the previous year.

capital_expenditures.context: Invested over $10 billion in Project Kuiper, a low earth orbit satellite constellation initiative.

share_repurchase.context: Share repurchase details not provided in the provided information.

daily_active_users.context: No specific user metrics provided in the provided information.

monthly_active_users.context: No specific user metrics provided in the provided information.

total_employees.context: Employees (full-time and part-time; excludes contractors & temporary personnel) increased to 1,468,000 in Q3 2021, up 30% year-over-year.

revenue_growth.expectation: Net sales expected to be between $130.0 billion and $140.0 billion, growing 4% to 12% compared with Q4 2020.
revenue_growth.constant_currency_growth: Excluding the unfavorable impact of approximately 60 basis points from foreign exchange rates.
factors: Increased demand for online shopping and AWS services
Expansion of Prime Video and other subscription services
Growth in AWS infrastructure and service offerings
Managing labor supply shortages and increased wage costs
Handling increased freight and shipping costs
Minimizing impact on customers and selling partners during the holiday season

leadership_transition.description: Jeff Bezos, Amazon founder and CEO, transitioned to the role of Executive Chair in Q3 2021, and Andy Jassy became Chief Executive Officer at that time.
leadership_transition.context: Jeff Bezos stepped down to focus on long-term strategic initiatives and innovation, while Andy Jassy, head of AWS, took over as CEO to lead Amazon's continued growth.
